channel.title: Events on BRB Robotics | FTC Team 26502 | Charlottesville, Virginia
channel.description: Recent content in Events on BRB Robotics | FTC Team 26502 | Charlottesville, Virginia

item.title: FLL Explore Expo
FLL Explore Expo
item.description: Come check out our local FIRST Lego League (FLL) scrimmage, where teams will battle it out in an exciting robot game! Watch as they put their creativity and engineering skills to the test on the field.

item.title: Robotics Building Workshop
item.description:
FTC Robotics Camp Overview

Time: 1 pm - 5 pm
Date: 10, 17, 24 of August
Max participants: 6
Age: 7-10th graders
Entry Fee: $150

FTC Robotics Camp Schedule


Day 1: Build the Basic Drivebase

1:00 PM â€“ 1:30 PM: Arrival and Icebreaker
1:30 PM â€“ 2:45 PM: Building Session 1
2:45 PM â€“ 3:00 PM: Break
3:00 PM â€“ 4:00 PM: Build Session 2

Day 2: Test and Modify Drivebase

1:00 PM â€“ 1:15 PM: Arrival and Recap
1:15 PM â€“ 1:30 PM: Introduction to Testing
1:30 PM â€“ 2:30 PM: Testing Session
2:30 PM â€“ 2:45 PM: Break
2:45 PM â€“ 3:30 PM: Modification Session
3:30 PM â€“ 4:00 PM: Final Testing

Day 3: Compete on the Obstacle Course

1:00 PM â€“ 1:15 PM: Arrival and Final Preparations
1:15 PM â€“ 1:30 PM: Obstacle Course Overview
1:30 PM â€“ 2:30 PM: Practice Runs
2:30 PM â€“ 2:45 PM: Break
2:45 PM â€“ 3:30 PM: Competition Time
3:30 PM â€“ 4:00 PM: Wrap-Up and Celebration

All funds from workshop sign-ups will go directly to supporting FTC Team 26502, BRB Robotics.

item.title: Build, Code, Compete! Lego Robotics
item.description:
Build, Code, Compete! Lego Robotics Overview

Time: 1 pm - 4 pm
Date: 9, 16, 23 of August
Max participants: 10
Ages: 8-12
Entry Fee: $199.99

Build, Code, Compete! Lego Robotics Schedule


Day 1: Build

1:00-1:15: Arrival/Introductions
1:15-1:30: Make teams
1:30-2:45: Build Session 1
2:45-3:00: Snack/Break
3:00-4:00: Build Session 2

Day 2: Code

1:00-1:15: Arrival/Introductions
1:15-1:30: Make teams
1:30-2:45: Code Session 1
2:45-3:00: Snack/Break
3:00-4:00: Code Session 2
3:30 PM â€“ 4:00 PM: Final Testing

Day 3 & 4: Compete

Saturday:
2:30 pm to 6:30 pm â€” practice and set up

Sunday:
9:00 am to 10:00 am â€” registration, robot inspection, and set up
10:00 am to 12:00 pm â€” qualification matches
12:00 pm to 1:00 pm â€” lunch
1:00 pm to 3:00 pm â€” qualification matched
3:00 pm to 4:00 pm â€” break
4:00 pm to 5:00 pm â€” closing ceremony

All funds from workshop sign-ups will go directly to supporting FTC Team 26502, BRB Robotics.
